attributes.action: Scrap Student Finance Direct and return powers to Local Authorities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Student Finance was a trial system and was flawed - it still delayed applications and the staff were not helpful!
This year has proved that centralising the system was a bad idea as the amount of applications quadrupled. This has caused major headaches and stress to both students and parents, and quite possibly has increased the stress levels of the staff

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
